channel.title: Looking for a skating sponsorship?
channel.description:
What's going on guys. Been looking for a skating sponsorship but clueless on where to begin looking, and who to talk to. Anyone got idea's on what steps i can take to get sponsored? Thanks!
[img]http://i1276.photobucket.com/albums/y463/marinesboy12/IMG_0341_zpsde1962a0.png[/img] [RAW] [img]http://i1276.photobucket.com/albums/y463/marinesboy12/IMG_0341_zps46f473a7.png[/img] [][][][] [img]http://i1276.photobucket.com/albums/y463/marinesboy12/IMG_0086_zps841c8920.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1276.photobucket.com/albums/y463/marinesboy12/IMG_0103_zpscd88e6d4.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1276.photobucket.com/albums/y463/marinesboy12/IMG_0084_zps07fe7ced.jpg[/img] [img]http://i1276.photobucket.com/albums/y463/marinesboy12/IMG_0085_zpscb3da125.jpg[/img]

item.title: Looking for a skating sponsorship?
item.dc:creator: @im4ever12c im4ever12c
item.description:
@im4ever12c wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:6, topic:546123”][quote author=im4ever12c link=topic=665018.msg4445489#msg4445489 date=1408574976]
I’ve been trying to throw together a Sponsor-Me video but can’t really find a video-recorder that is good enough to actually follow me and keep the camera at least a little steady.
[/quote]
Then get a steady cam. Have you tried to run or skateboard with a camera and keep it steady?[/quote]

Me and my older brother use to do this all the time for fun before I actually started getting decent and it actually came out to look extremely good and smooth. He just went to his AIT for the second stage of his basic training though, so I guess I’ll have to go 3 months before I am able to throw together the video. But hey, the more practice, the better the shot of me getting someone to notice me.

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for a skating sponsorship?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

im4ever12c:

I’ve been trying to throw together a Sponsor-Me video but can’t really find a video-recorder that is good enough to actually follow me and keep the camera at least a little steady.

Then get a steady cam. Have you tried to run or skateboard with a camera and keep it steady?

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for a skating sponsorship?
item.dc:creator: @im4ever12c im4ever12c
item.description:
@im4ever12c wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:2, topic:546123”]Keep doing local contests and winning.
Constantly put your name out there.
Try and get in the bigger intermediate/advanced comps.
You’ll get noticed as you take titles.[/quote]
Been in the search for some local contests but in my location, there really is no skateparks that are as big as a normal sized lot for a house. There really are no contests that are hosted near me, which is a real bummer. The only skating I am able to get in is street because the skatepark closest to me is near a pool, and it’s smaller than the lot my house is sitting on (in a sub-divison, which really says something.)

[quote=“lare69, post:3, topic:546123”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=665018.msg4445485#msg4445485 date=1408574470]
Keep doing local contests and winning.
Constantly put your name out there.
Try and get in the bigger intermediate/advanced comps.
You’ll get noticed as you take titles.
[/quote]
youtube videos as well

try and develop your own style steez is very important[/quote]

I’ve been trying to throw together a Sponsor-Me video but can’t really find a video-recorder that is good enough to actually follow me and keep the camera at least a little steady.

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for a skating sponsorship?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“lare69, post:3, topic:546123”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=665018.msg4445485#msg4445485 date=1408574470]
Keep doing local contests and winning.
Constantly put your name out there.
Try and get in the bigger intermediate/advanced comps.
You’ll get noticed as you take titles.
[/quote]
youtube videos as well

try and develop your own style steez is very important[/quote]
Youtube was intertwined with the whole “put your name out there” but yes.
Youtube is a great way these days.
